thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text: I know Banggood.com for just 3 months. I have ordered only 5 products and I have only good words to tell about them. Even though I received 2 items I have had a good collaboration to solve my issues in terms of returning my money back. For me it is very important to know there is someone who can help you in any case or time. I hope Banggood will keep that kind of high level of service and I promise, I will buy again whatever I need. Thank you, Athena, thank you Banggood!
